# IOWarp Technical Documentation
> Technical reference for the IOWarp context orchestration platform

## What is IOWarp?
IOWarp is a context orchestration platform for agentic AI in scientific computing. It provides a high-performance runtime (Chimaera), SDK, and agent toolkit (CLIO Kit) for bridging AI agents with HPC infrastructure.

## Documentation Sections
- Getting Started: Installation, Quick Start
- CLIO Kit: 16 MCP servers, 150+ tools for scientific computing
- SDK Reference: IPC, Runtime Modules, Context Transfer Engine, Context Assimilation Engine
- API Reference: Python API (CEE), Agent API, Storage API
- Deployment: Configuration, HPC Clusters, Performance Tuning

## Key URLs
- Documentation: https://docs.iowarp.ai
- Website: https://iowarp.ai
- CLIO Kit Showcase: https://toolkit.iowarp.ai
- GitHub: https://github.com/iowarp
